name: muscle
description:
MUSCLE is one of the best-performing multiple alignment programs
according to published benchmark tests, with accuracy and speed that are
consistently better than CLUSTALW.

dependent_to.name: biopieces
dependent_to.description:
The Biopieces are a collection of bioinformatics tools that can be
pieced together in a very easy and flexible manner to perform both
simple and complex tasks.

dependent_to.name: guidance
dependent_to.description:
Guidance: Accurate detection of unreliable alignment regions accounting
for the uncertainty of multiple parameters.

dependent_to.name: phyluce
dependent_to.description:
phyluce (phy-loo-chee) is a software package that was initially
developed for analyzing data collected from ultraconserved elements in
organismal genomes

dependent_to.name: snphylo
dependent_to.description: A pipeline to generate a phylogenetic tree from huge SNP data

dependent_to.name: tcoffee
dependent_to.description: T-Coffee is a multiple sequence alignment program.

dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit
dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.

dependent_to.name: shortbred
dependent_to.description:
ShortBRED is a system for profiling protein families of interest at very
high specificity in shotgun meta'omic sequencing data.
